translation.en: No. No, no, no. I know. Shh.
Hello, Mr. Davis.
My name is Jack Carter, and you don't wanna know me.

translation.en: I know it's just one guy talking, but I'll be honest.
translation.es: Es mi opinión, pero seré sincero.

translation.en: I don't understand what the big fricking deal is. I don't.
translation.es: No entiendo de qué demonios va esto.

translation.en: Listen, I told Fletcher I was gonna get him the money.
You shut up.
Give me a break, will you, Jack?
In all honestly, you haven't seen the guy

translation.en: in, what, four, five years? He kicks,
translation.es: ¿Cuánto hace que no le ves? ¿4, 5 años? ¿Se muere, y ahora te importa?

translation.en: and all of a sudden you give a shit?
Who are you, Father Mulcahy? I'm so not buying this,
translation.es: ¿Eres cura? Es tan increíble que ni siquiera tiene gracia.

translation.en: it's not even funny, kemo sabe.
translation.es: Es tan increíble que ni siquiera tiene gracia.

translation.en: He was my little brother and he's dead.
He left a wife and kid. So I'm going. I owe him that.

translation.en: Let me get this straight. Now you owe him?
Here's the bad news, sports fans: It's a little late.
Well, listen, the therapy session is good,
translation.es: La sesión de terapia está bien, y la necesitáis.

translation.en: you know, because you need it. But why don't I
translation.es: La sesión de terapia está bien, y la necesitáis. Pero yo me voy. Tengo que hablar con…

translation.en: just go somewhere else? I'm gonna talk to--
translation.es: Pero yo me voy. Tengo que hablar con…

translation.en: or this is going to the next level, you got that?
"Next level"? What is that, a catch phrase or something? What the--? I mean...
translation.es: "Al siguiente nivel". ¿Eso es una frase hecha?

translation.en: Catch phrase?
Jack, Jack, Jack. Come on. Take it easy. Take it easy.
translation.es: Jack, basta. Cálmate o te dará un infarto.

translation.en: You're gonna give yourself a fucking heart attack.

translation.en: Fletcher wants your ass here. He's made that very clear. He wants you here.
translation.es: Fletcher quiere verte aquí. Lo ha dejado claro.

translation.en: I'm like a broken record.
If you don't take care of business,
translation.es: Si no te ocupas de los negocios

translation.en: the business will take care of you.

translation.en: I'm taking care of business. Whatever.
What time's your flight? I'm not flying.

translation.en: Beg your pardon? Not flying, Connie.
Uh-huh. So would you say you got something special working there?
What are you carrying? Knives, guns, flamethrowers?
Got something you're not telling Con-a-won-a-doo-da-day about?

translation.en: I'm back in a couple of days.
translation.es: Volveré en un par de días.

translation.en: Right, but... Jack?
What are you doing here?
I came to pay my respects.
He could've used your respect while he was still alive.

translation.en: Is Doreen around?
Yeah, she's around.
PRIEST: "I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.
translation.es: "Alzaré los ojos hacia las colinas de donde obtendré mi ayuda.

translation.en: My help cometh from the Lord, which made Heaven and Earth.
translation.es: Mi ayuda viene de Dios, que creó cielo y Tierra.

translation.en: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved:
translation.es: Él no dejará que muevan tu pie.

translation.en: He that keepeth thee will not slumber.
translation.es: Él vela por ti y no dormitará.

translation.en: Behold, He that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
translation.es: Mirad, Él cuida de Israel y no dormitará ni dormirá.

translation.en: The Lord is thy keeper.
The Lord is thy shade upon thy right hand.
translation.es: El Señor es tu sombra en tu mano derecha.

translation.en: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
translation.es: El Señor es tu sombra en tu mano derecha. El sol no me dañará de día, ni la luna de noche.

translation.en: The Lord shall preserve thee from all evil. He shall preserve thy soul.
translation.es: El Señor te resguardará de todo mal.

translation.en: The Lord shall preserve thy going out
and thy coming in from this day forth
and even for evermore. Amen."
How you doing? I'm Jack, Richie's brother.
translation.es: ¿Qué tal? Soy Jack, hermano de Richie.

translation.en: Oh, shit, man. Hi, I'm Eddie.
I worked with him over at the George.
translation.es: Trabajaba con él en el George.

translation.en: Eddie, let me ask you a question.
Was my brother into something? Richie? No, man.
He wasn't that type of guy.
I'm very sorry about your father.
translation.es: Lamento mucho lo de tu padre.

translation.en: Don't feel sorry for me.
You don't know me.
You're a picture on a piano.
translation.es: Eres una foto sobre el piano.

translation.en: Hold up a second, would you?
I couldn't help noticing you. You stand out in a crowd.
translation.es: Me he fijado en usted. Destacaba entre todos.

translation.en: I'm Jack, Richie's brother.
I'm real sorry. He was a great guy. Yeah.
So, uh, where'd you know Richard from?
Around the bar.
You know how it goes.
translation.es: Ya sabe lo que es eso.

translation.en: Why don't you tell me, how's it go?
Look, I really don't know you well enough to get personal.
translation.es: No le conozco y son temas personales.

translation.en: JACK: Let me ask you. You think something could've happened
between the last time you saw him and when the accident did happen?
translation.es: entre que le viste y el accidente?

translation.en: EDDIE: I don't know. Maybe, I guess.
JACK: But you would know if something was off, right?
Shit, man, I don't know. I guess. Yeah, maybe.
translation.es: No lo sé. Es posible, supongo.

translation.en: Jack, that is enough.
It's enough.
What are you gonna do, rough me up?
I'd kind of like to be alone.
Sure.
I'm fine, all right? I just came out for a smoke.
translation.es: Estoy bien, ¿vale? Solo he salido a fumar.

translation.en: You know, Doreen, you don't know me very well,
translation.es: Doreen, creo que no me conoces, y lo que sabes de mí

translation.en: and what you do know, you don't seem to like very much.
translation.es: Doreen, creo que no me conoces, y lo que sabes de mí no parece gustarte.

translation.en: I'm gonna be here over the weekend, so if you need anything, anything at all,
translation.es: Pasaré aquí el fin de semana, así que si necesitas algo,

translation.en: I'll be staying at the Mercer Hotel, okay?
He didn't drink, you know. What?
My dad.
He wouldn't drink and drive.
So, what do you think happened?
I don't know.
Maybe...
I don't know. Forget it.
He's dead, all right. What's it matter?
Tell my mom I'll be home later.
translation.es: Dile a mi madre que llegaré tarde.

translation.en: LES [OVER PHONE]: What'd I tell you? What'd I say?
Which part of "I can't let you go" did you not under-fucking-stand?
translation.es: Lo de "No puedo dejarte ir", ¿no lo entendiste?

translation.en: This is your job.
This is not a fricking charity case. You do your job.
translation.es: No es una obra benéfica. ¡Es tu trabajo!

translation.en: Now, I want your butt down here tomorrow.
I am the boss, Jack. Okay?
Got me?
JACK: I can't believe you guys kept this cat.
translation.es: Es increíble que tengáis el gato.

translation.en: Richie and I, we used to hide stuff from our mom underneath all the cookies.
translation.es: Richie y yo escondíamos cosas bajo las galletas.

translation.en: I'm pretty sure she knew, but I don't think she really cared.
translation.es: Mamá debía saberlo, pero no le importaba.

translation.en: So were you two guys okay?
What? I mean, you and Richie...
I mean, before the accident, were you two getting along okay?
translation.es: Antes del accidente, ¿todo iba bien entre vosotros?

translation.en: What kind of question is that? Well, it's just a question.
translation.es: -¿Qué pregunta es esa? -Solo es una pregunta.

translation.en: Was he drinking a lot more? More than normal?
Wha--? Jack.
It's just Eddie said he didn't see him drink much.
translation.es: Eddie no le vio beber demasiado.

translation.en: And Doreen said he wouldn't drink and drive.
translation.es: Y Doreen dice que no conduciría bebido.

translation.en: So I'm just wondering-- Oh, Jack. What are you doing?
translation.es: Y Doreen dice que no conduciría bebido. Jack, ¿qué estás haciendo?

translation.en: What? Why do you care all of a sudden?
Because he's dead?
Where were you when he was alive?
He was your brother. You disappeared on him, now he's gone.
translation.es: Era tu hermano. Le abandonaste y ahora ya no está.

translation.en: So, what am I supposed to do?
Take a trip down memory lane with you?
Catch you up on how he was doing?
What do you think you're gonna do, come in here and fix things?
translation.es: ¿Crees que vas a llegar y arreglarlo todo?

translation.en: You don't fix things, Jack.
You break things.
Remember?
Hello, it's Connie. Yeah, it's me.
Jack. What do you say, Jack?
Fucking white of you to call. Fletcher just ripped me a new asshole.
translation.es: Me alegra que llames. Fletcher casi me la corta.

translation.en: You on your way back? No, I wanna stay a little while.
Oh, come on. Who do you think's
taking the heat here? We're partners.
Look it up, it'll say, "If you're screwed, I'm screwed."
translation.es: ¿Quién está pagando el pato? ¡Somos socios! Si tú caes, yo también. Vuelve ya.

translation.en: He wants you here. You need a written invitation?
translation.es: Si tú caes, yo también. Vuelve ya. -¿Te envío una invitación? -Tengo cosas que hacer.

translation.en: I got some things to do.
translation.es: -¿Te envío una invitación? -Tengo cosas que hacer.

translation.en: Okay. Okay, Jack, here's the truth as I know it.
translation.es: Muy bien, te lo diré claramente.

translation.en: I don't know how much longer I can cover your ass.

translation.en: Are we gonna see Fletcher, or what?
Absolutely. We are flying in. We are there.
translation.es: -¿Vamos a ver a Fletcher? -Claro. Ya casi estamos.

translation.en: You got something to say? What do you wanna say?
translation.es: Si tienes algo que decirme, dímelo.

translation.en: It's time for you to chop it up with the big dog.

translation.en: Because I'm hearing talk, Jack. People are talking.
translation.es: Porque he oído rumores. La gente habla.

translation.en: About you and Audrey. I don't know how long I can keep that from him.
translation.es: De ti y de Audrey. No podré evitar que lo sepa.

translation.en: They must be hearing it from you.
Am I right? Oh, you simple bitch.
I'm covering your ass. Do you hear me?
I'm covering your ass! You better cover your own ass.
Which way is Brumby's office?
No, you listen. I don't wanna hear you can't find it.

translation.en: This was supposed to be done.
A guy died the other night.

translation.en: Can you hold on a second?
Can I help you with something? I'm Jack Carter.

translation.en: Richie's brother.

translation.en: I'll call you right back.
Uh, Christ. I'm sorry I wasn't at the funeral,

translation.en: Would you like some coffee or something?
No, I'm fine, thanks.
He was a good bloke, Richie was.
Saved my ass a lot of money just by doing a solid job.

translation.en: So how long was he running this place for you?
Well, since we've been up. About five years.
translation.es: Desde que inauguramos. Unos cinco años.

translation.en: Five years and no problems? None.
No enemies?
Well, not that I know of. I mean, he was an easygoing sort of bloke.
translation.es: No que yo sepa. Tenía un carácter muy afable.

translation.en: Does he seem like a guy that would get dead drunk
and go out driving in a rainstorm?
Not to me. Me either.
Where is this going?
I think he was taken out.
Taken out?
Richie?
Why would you say that?
There's something you're not telling me, Cliff.
What the hell does that mean? Just relax.
Listen, I don't like hard cases coming in here and talking to me like I know something.
translation.es: No me gusta que me hablen como si yo supiera algo.

translation.en: If there's someone putting out something about me,
translation.es: Si alguien dice cosas de mí, quiero saber quién es.

translation.es: Si alguien dice cosas de mí, quiero saber quién es. Y cuando sepa qué y quién

translation.en: and who's saying it, I might take the matter up with you.

translation.en: You're a big man, but you're out of shape.

translation.en: With me, it's a full-time job. So please, sit down.

translation.en: Thank you.
Now, I know you got security cameras around the bar.

translation.en: Did the police ask to look at the tapes?
Why would they? It was drunk driving.
Mind if I do?
That's got the whole night on it.

translation.en: Oh, Christ. How am I gonna put this?
She was his, uh, lady on the side. His innamorata.

What can I tell you? It wasn't a big thing.
Not many people knew about it.

How you doing?
Holy shit.
Well, if it ain't the Vegas man with the Vegas tan.

So you still running with Fletcher?
Why not? How are you making a living?

With somebody. What do you care? JACK: I don't care.
I just wanna know if you're still a bottom-feeder.

translation.en: Oh, let me tell you something, Jack.

translation.en: This is the new world, brother. I'm online. These are my girls, my business.

translation.en: While you're running around chasing deadbeats for some fucking asshole,
translation.es: Mientras tú persigues a pelagatos para un mamón de mierda

translation.en: I'm swimming in the big pool, baby. I got the juice around here now.

translation.en: I hooked up with this freak and this foreign guy.

translation.en: Created my own little empire.
Look at you.
The little man versus the start-up.
You got a problem with me?
Let me tell you something, Jack.
I think you should take a very big moment
translation.es: Deberías pararte a reflexionar y plantearte

translation.en: and just think about where you are.
Because this ain't yesterday, slick.

translation.en: Relax, I'm just playing with you a little bit.
Oh, yeah, I get that.
Don't put your hands on me.

translation.en: Come on, let me see your eyes.
Come on.
Whatever turns you on, Jack.

translation.en: Still pretty? Hm?
Like cat piss in the snow.
translation.es: Como pis de gato en la nieve.

translation.en: See you around.
Hey, you can't come-- Hey, you can't come in here.
Hey, mate, where you going?
Is this the part where I'm supposed to be scared?
You Carter?
That's right.
And you really don't wanna know me.
Shit, it's good to be home.
Damn you, Cyrus, I never met the guy.
Get off. I don't know him. Shut up and get in the car.

translation.en: Good afternoon, sir. Are you a member? I'm here with Mr. Franklin.

translation.en: Nice stroke.
Who the fuck are you?
I'm gonna go get security, all right?
Can I help you, sir? I don't know.
Ahem, are you from the club? Is there a problem?
My brother died the other night, and now I'm here.

translation.en: Listen, uh, Mr-- Carter.
Carter. Mr. Carter. Um...
I'm real sorry about your brother, that sucks.

So, what I suggest you do is contact my outreach program

translation.en: Uh, yes. Yes, I mind.
I was under the impression this was a private club. Heh.

translation.en: I think we should go someplace and talk.
Okay, listen, scary man-- I scare you?
Okay, whatever this is, it isn't going over real well, so...
translation.es: Sea lo que sea, no lo hace nada bien.

translation.en: Why don't you drive me back to my car? We can talk on the way. Is that a problem?

translation.en: Yeah, it is a problem. No, no. It's a problem if you don't.
translation.es: -Sí, hay un problema. -No, lo habrá si no lo hace.

translation.en: Come on. It's okay. Come on.
So, what's your name? Jeremy Kinnear.
Maybe you've read about me in Forbes.

translation.en: No, I don't do that, Jeremy. So, what are you telling me, you're bucks-up?
translation.es: No leo eso, Jeremy. ¿Significa que está forrado?

translation.en: Well, without blowing the proverbial horn
my computer company is worth about a gazillion dollars.
Give or take. Your folks must be very proud.
I paid off my student loans, bought them a house in France.

translation.en: They leave me alone.
I think we've got a mutual acquaintance, Jeremy.
JEREMY: Oh, really? Yeah. Cyrus Paice.
Yeah, I know him.
I try not to spend too much time around him though.

translation.en: What's the connection? I don't see it.
You know, Mr. Carter, I really don't have to answer your questions.

translation.en: Sure you do, Jeremy.
What's the connection?
Okay, Mr. Carter, fine.
You know, um...
when you spend most of your life stuck behind a computer

translation.en: things like golf and girls become pretty important, you know?

translation.en: But they don't go real well with the glasses
translation.es: Pero no cuadran con la imagen

translation.en: and pocket-protector image my stockholders prefer.

translation.en: So-- So he pulls for you.
You know why I like golf, Mr. Carter?

translation.en: Because the ball just keeps going away.

translation.en: The only sport where you hit that little sucker and it doesn't come back at you.

And when I get to it...
I just knock it away again.
You see what I'm saying, Mr. Carter?
Once I get rid of it...
I never wanna see it again.

STAFFER: Excuse me, Mr. Kinnear.
Can you get your feet off the table? Yes, sorry. Sure.
translation.es: -¿Puede quitar los pies de la mesa? -Sí, claro.

translation.en: No. No, no. You listen. Listen to me. Listen to me.
You asked me to get you online. I did that for you. Fair trade.

translation.es: Pero empezaste lo del porno. Y me implicaste.

translation.en: Goddamn right I'm freaking out. I'm a fucking Harvard grad. I do not do porn.

translation.en: No, no, no. Shh, shh, shh, shh!
I don't want to know what happened the other night.
I don't care.
It's none of my business.
I just want the big brother gone.

I mean, away. I want him away. I want you away.

Where's the big bad wolf? Out with the pigs, I guess.

translation.es: Audrey, he pensado que al volver, tú y yo nos iremos

You...
You're...

All right, fine. You ought to get out of there, with or without me

Audrey! I'm up here.
Get your ass down here. I gotta go.

translation.es: y me pregunto cuándo nos alejamos.

translation.en: She's all I have now, Jack, and I-- You know, I want her back so bad
translation.es: Ella es todo lo que tengo. Deseo recuperarla

translation.en: and I don't even know where she went.
translation.es: pero no sé adónde ha ido.

translation.en: She won't talk to me. She won't even yell at me.
translation.es: No me habla. Ya ni siquiera me grita.

translation.en: Oh, my God.
Who are you? What?
I mean, I'm just trying to make sense of this... of you.
translation.es: Intento encontrarle sentido a esto. A ti.

translation.en: You disappear off the face of the earth
for like five years and then come back and you...
translation.es: Desapareces durante cinco años y luego regresas.

translation.en: You come back and--
I don't know, you look like Frank Sinatra or something.
translation.es: No sé, pareces Frank Sinatra o alguien así.

translation.en: And I just can't figure you out.
You know, it's not that big a deal, Gloria.
You know... everything changes, they say.
Why not me?
I just wanna try to do something right. Once.
translation.es: Quiero hacer algo bien. Por una vez.

translation.en: Yeah, well, what is that, though?
What's right, Jack, you know? You're too late to be Richie's brother.
translation.es: ¿Qué harás? Es tarde para ser el hermano de Richie.

translation.en: You can't be Doreen's father.
And you can't be my man.
So I just don't know where you fit.
translation.es: Así que no sé dónde encajas.

translation.en: Maybe I don't.
Maybe I don't.
I'm sorry.
JACK: Eddie.
You know Geraldine. What?
Geraldine. Do you know where she lives?
I don't know, man. The girl that hung around--
The girl that hung around with Richie, do you know where she lives?
translation.es: La chica que iba con Richie, ¿sabes dónde vive?

translation.en: A girl? What? Come on.
So you know Doreen much?
Uh, yeah, a little.
Hey, it's right up here on the left.
So, uh, you done with me, man?
No. Sit tight, I'll be right back.
Relax, everything is okay. How you doing?
I'm looking for Geraldine. You know where she is?
What was Richard to you?
You can't just break into my house. What was he to you?
translation.es: -No puedes entrar así. -¿Qué era él para ti?

translation.en: I told you.
I met him at the bar.
He was just a guy I met.
translation.es: Era un tipo al que conocí.

translation.en: That's all.
That's all?
He was nicer than most. Did you know he was married?
Look-- Did you know that?
What do you want?
I talked to him, okay? It's not a crime. I gotta be somewhere.
translation.es: Hablé con él, no es delito. Tengo que irme.

translation.en: I wanna know what happened.
You don't wanna know.
Look at me.
Look at me.
I didn't come up here to hurt you.
translation.es: No he venido a hacerte daño.

translation.en: I just wanna know what happened.
translation.es: Solo quiero saber lo que pasó.

translation.en: Richie wanted me to leave with him.
translation.es: Quería que me fuera con él.

translation.en: He and his wife weren't getting along so well.
translation.es: No se llevaba bien con su mujer.

translation.en: Hardly spoke, you know?
They were gonna get divorced.
He wanted me to run away, someplace like New York or something.
translation.es: Quería ir a Nueva York o un sitio así.

translation.en: I said I couldn't do that, you know?
translation.es: Le dije que no podía hacerlo.

translation.en: I got my own life here.
Yeah.
So I went to the bar to say goodbye, and he followed me out.
translation.es: Fui al bar a despedirme y salimos fuera.

translation.en: And he makes this big scene outside the bar.
translation.es: Y en la calle me montó una escena.

translation.en: I hear he got pretty drunk.
Look, I don't wanna talk about this anymore.
translation.es: No quiero hablar más de esto.

translation.en: The keys are in it.
Looks like the rain must have backed up the sewer.
translation.es: La lluvia ha desbordado la cloaca.

translation.en: How you been, man?
Still hanging around here, Thorpey? I like it here.
I gotta have a word with you, all right?
And, uh, confidential.
You just stay in the car. I'll listen. So, what do you wanna tell me?
translation.es: Quédate en el coche. ¿Qué quieres decirme?

translation.en: How you been, man? I mean, you look good.
Thank you. I'm losing sleep here. So, what do you want?
translation.es: -¿Qué tal? Tienes buen aspecto. -Gracias. Al grano. ¿Qué quieres?

translation.en: Here, take this. It's free.
Alaska Airlines, first class. That's nice.
And who do I have to thank?
I've been asked to make sure you get on that plane. Tonight.
translation.es: Debo asegurarme que subes al avión. Esta noche.

translation.en: Whatever they're paying you, it ain't gonna be enough.
Come on. What you wanna do, boy? Come on, cowboy.
You wanna get rough? Come on. Take your best shot. Come on.
translation.es: ¿Qué vas a hacer, vaquero? Dispara ya. ¡Vamos!

translation.en: Come on, shoot him.
You got the stuff?
Put the gun down. JACK: Got the balls?
Let's see you do it. Go on.
translation.es: Si tienes agallas, dispara ya. ¡Baja el arma! ¡Bájala!

translation.en: Put it down. Put it down.
Come on. Come on.
WOMAN: Get back!
MAN: Get down! THORPEY: Out of the way.
Watch out!
THORPEY: Okay. Okay.
Fuck.
Come on, the ride's over. Asked me to deliver the ticket
translation.es: Fin del paseo. Te lo di porque conocías a mi hermano.

translation.en: because you used to hang around my brother.
translation.es: Te lo di porque conocías a mi hermano.

translation.en: I knew you wouldn't go for it. Who sent you?
I can't tell you. You can't? Did you have something to do with my brother?
translation.es: -No puedo decírtelo. -¿Tenías algo que ver con mi hermano?

translation.en: I had nothing to do with your brother.
Then give me a name, or you're history.
translation.es: Dame un nombre o serás historia.

translation.en: Brumby's in the back.
Carter? So now you're a travel agent.
What? That was a real nice touch,
sending Thorpey, very nostalgic.
What the hell are you talking about? What'd Richie have on you?
translation.es: -¿De qué hablas? -¿Qué sabía Richie de ti?

translation.en: Bloody hell, Jack. Richie was my friend.
What does it take, a fucking miracle for you to believe that?
translation.es: ¿Hace falta un milagro para que lo creas?

translation.en: You're not giving me anything here.
Oh, Jack, Jack, Jack.
Jack, stop that. Stop it, for fuck's sake.
translation.es: No hagas eso. Déjalo ya, joder.

translation.en: Look, okay. I owed this bloke some money.
translation.es: Está bien. Yo le debía dinero a un tipo.

translation.en: He fronted a truckload last year to extend the club.
translation.es: Me adelantó mucha pasta para ampliar el club.

translation.en: He calls me this afternoon, says he'll wipe the slate clean
translation.es: Hoy me ha llamado para perdonarme la deuda

translation.en: if I'll do this thing for him.
He said he wanted you out of town.
That's all. He didn't say how, just out of town.
translation.es: Eso es todo. No ha dicho cómo, solo lejos de la ciudad.

translation.en: Your brother was my friend, Jack. I wouldn't hurt him.
translation.es: Tu hermano era mi amigo. No le haría daño.

translation.en: Yeah.
Give me a name or this is going to another level.
translation.es: Dame un nombre o pasaremos a otro nivel.

translation.en: JACK: You want me out?! Huh? You want me out?!
You wanna do this? You wanna do this?
Rabbit's out of the hat. Let's see if it jumps.
What'd you do to Richie? Damn you! I didn't do nothing.
I hate to be the bearer of bad news, but you're chasing your ass.
translation.es: Odio dar malas noticias, pero te muerdes la cola.

translation.en: You were gone too long, brother. Shit changes.
translation.es: Has estado fuera mucho tiempo. Todo cambia.

translation.en: Maybe not you, but some shit does change.
translation.es: Quizá tú no, pero esto cambia.

translation.en: You brother, your precious brother, Richie, was no goddamn saint.
translation.es: Tu querido hermanito Richie no era un santo.

translation.en: Everybody's into something. Plain and simple, all right?
translation.es: Todos están metidos en algo. Así de simple.

translation.en: There's no mystery, no intrigue.
He got juiced up one night. He got oiled up
translation.es: Una noche bebió más de la cuenta

translation.en: and he wrapped his sorry ass around a tree.
translation.es: y empotró su culo contra un árbol.

translation.en: End of story.
Now, if you wanna do this little dance here
translation.es: Si ahora quieres que bailemos por los viejos tiempos…

translation.en: for old time's sake, Jack, bring it.
translation.es: Si ahora quieres que bailemos por los viejos tiempos… adelante.

translation.en: Let me tell you something, you're gonna end up
translation.es: Pero te advierto que acabarás como un manco

translation.en: like a one-legged man in an ass-kicking contest.
translation.es: Pero te advierto que acabarás como un manco en un combate de boxeo.

translation.en: I'm tired of your bullshit, Jack. I'm a businessman.
translation.es: Estoy harto de tus chorradas. Soy un empresario.

translation.en: I got ladies waiting for me on the inside.
translation.es: Ahí dentro me esperan unas damas.

translation.en: Grow up, Jack.
DOREEN: Uncle Jack.
I didn't think you were gonna show up.
I was in the neighborhood, you know?
Listen, I'm having one of those year-long nights.
translation.es: Doreen, hoy tengo una mala noche y no sería una buena compañía.

translation.en: I don't know if I'd be fun to be around.
translation.es: y no sería una buena compañía.

translation.en: Maybe we ought to take a rain check on this.
Okay?
Okay. All right.
Bye. I'll give you a call tomorrow.
You hungry?
A little.
You drink coffee? Mm, yeah.
I smoke too.
I don't know if that's worth bragging about, do you?
translation.es: Más vale no jactarse de ello.

translation.en: You smoke.
Well, I did. But I just recently quit.
Oh, yeah? When?
Oh, I'd say about...
now.
So if you don't mind.
translation.es: Así que si no te importa.

translation.en: Makes you nuts, doesn't it?
It's having an impact, yes.
You are so freaky.
Well, we're all a little freaky, Doreen.
It's those straight ones we gotta worry about.
So, what do you do, like, for work?
What'd your father tell you? He didn't.
That's good.
Mom said you were a gambler.
Isn't that illegal?
Are you a bookie?
Bookie? No. More like, um...
More like a financial adjuster.
So you ever been to prison?
For how long? How about this weather?
Come on.
What do you say we change the subject?
All right. Fine.
You ever shoot anybody?
You wanna know what I do for a living?
Simple. People make promises and they break them.
translation.es: Las personas hacen promesas y las rompen.

translation.en: My job is to refresh their memory.
That's about it. No big deal.
What's with the clothes?
What's with the jewelry in your face? Heh. You don't like it?
translation.es: -¿Y ese adorno en tu cara? -No te gusta.

translation.en: It's nice. Heh.
You ever been married?
I don't think so.
So you don't have a family of your own.
What are you?
DOREEN: Why'd you leave?
JACK: Well, Doreen, that's a long, long story.
DOREEN: It's a long, long ride.
Let's put it this way.
You ever wanna take every mirror in the world and get rid of it
because you didn't like what was coming back at you?
translation.es: al no gustarte lo que ves?

translation.en: Yeah.
I wish my dad was here.
Me too.
Do you really think somebody killed him?
Yeah, I think so, but...
Me too.
So do you have a license yet? Yep.
What, did you, like, learn that in school?
Dad taught me. Oh, yeah?
Doreen, would you wait in the car?
Why? Why? It's all right.
Wait in the car. I'll be right back. It's okay. It's okay.
translation.es: Tú espera en el coche. Enseguida vuelvo.

translation.en: If you need help, hang up and then dial the operator.
translation.es: Si necesita ayuda, cuelgue y llame a la telefonista.

translation.en: GLORIA: Jack.
You all right? Have you seen Doreen?
What happened? Who did it? I have no idea where she is.
translation.es: -¿Qué ha pasado? -¿Dónde está? -¿Quién era? -No lo sé. Ha entrado y…

translation.en: He came-- I don't know. He came in. I...
translation.es: -¿Quién era? -No lo sé. Ha entrado y…

translation.en: Are you okay? You all right? It's gonna be all right.
Really.
Why'd they do this? I don't know.
translation.es: -¿Por qué lo han hecho? -No lo sé.

translation.en: But I'm gonna find out, you can believe that.
translation.es: Pero lo averiguaré, te lo aseguro.

translation.en: Come on, let's go get your mom. Where are we going?
I want you guys to stay with me tonight, okay?
translation.es: Quiero que paséis la noche conmigo.

translation.en: Gloria, why don't we get out of here?
Yeah. I'm fine. I'm okay.
I need to talk to your Uncle Jack alone.
translation.es: Quiero hablar con tu tío a solas.

translation.en: JACK: What's wrong?
GLORIA: I need you to leave. JACK: What?
My mom's coming over. We're gonna go to her place tonight.
translation.es: Ahora vendrá mi madre. Nos iremos a su casa.

translation.en: We're gonna stay there. Listen, I know that you wanna help.
translation.es: Ahora vendrá mi madre. Nos iremos a su casa. Oye, ya sé que quieres ayudar.

translation.en: But just look around you.
Look what you brought into my house. Look at my face.
translation.es: Mira lo que has traído a mi casa. Mira mi cara.

translation.en: Look at my family. You're not helping, Jack.
translation.es: Mira mi familia. No nos ayudas, Jack.

translation.en: So please go.
Wait. What are you say--? I brought in--? I didn't bring anything into this--
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres decir? ¿Traer? Yo no he traído nada.

translation.en: Gloria. Look, I just wanna know the truth.
translation.es: ¿Qué quieres decir? ¿Traer? Yo no he traído nada. ¿En qué líos estaba metido Richie?

translation.en: What the hell was Richie into?
Oh, God.
Oh, my head hurts. That's all right.
Whatever this costs, I'll just take care of it, all right?
translation.es: Yo me encargaré, cueste lo que cueste.

translation.en: I think maybe you and Doreen wanna get out of town.
Take a vacation. I'll take care of that too.
translation.es: Haced vacaciones, correré con los gastos.

translation.en: You shouldn't be here. Just-- We're fine. We're fine.
translation.es: Haced vacaciones, correré con los gastos. No. Estamos bien.

translation.en: Just go.
I'm sorry, Gloria.
Hey.
I snuck out.
Took a cab.
Grandma's house smells funny.
translation.es: La casa de la abuela huele raro.

translation.en: Do you wanna come in?
Nice tattoos.
I'll bring her by in the morning. Yeah, I promise.
translation.es: La llevaré por la mañana. Sí, lo prometo.

translation.en: All right. Good night.
Your mother is a little upset.
It was your idea to call her.
Ah, listen, I don't mind.
She cares about you, she loves you. That's...
translation.es: Se preocupa por ti, te quiere.

translation.en: That's pretty special. Listen, you got one mother, right?
translation.es: Eso es importante, solo tienes una madre.

translation.en: It's a real scary place out there, so I don't blame her.
translation.es: Este mundo es terrorífico, por eso no la culpo.

translation.en: You must be a little tired.
I'll tell you what, why don't you take the bed?
I got a lot of work to do in the other room, and, uh...
translation.es: Yo tengo trabajo en la otra habitación.

translation.en: I'll take you home in the morning, okay?
translation.es: Por la mañana te llevaré a casa.

translation.en: It's gonna be all right, really.
I was coming for you.
Bet you didn't know you had a fairy godmother, Jack.
translation.es: Seguro que no sabías que tenía un hada madrina.

translation.en: You gave my brother a disc. What was on it? A fairy godmother all of your own.
translation.es: -¿Qué había en el disquete? -Un hada madrina para ti solo.

translation.en: Don't play me, Geraldine, all right? No more games.
No more dress up, you understand?
You gave my brother a disc.
translation.es: Le diste un disquete a Richie.

translation.en: What was on it?
I don't know what you're-- No.
I'll tell you something. If you lie,
translation.es: Te aviso, si me mientes, te romperé…

translation.en: I'm gonna break every-- Listen to me.
translation.es: Te aviso, si me mientes, te romperé… Escúchame.

translation.en: I'm gonna break every beautiful bone in your body.
translation.es: Te romperé cada precioso hueso de tu cuerpo.

translation.en: I'm not lying to you.
I'm just here because he wanted to see you.
translation.es: Estoy aquí porque él quiere verte.

translation.en: Who?
The Demon King.
He wanted to speak to you, so he made some calls
and he waved his magic wand and... poof!
Shit.
Sorry.
Hell of a day you had, huh, Mr. Carter?
translation.es: Menudo día tuvo ayer, ¿no, señor Carter?

translation.en: Sorry to get you up so early.
Personally, I hate mornings.
Where you going?
Uh, she's done her job. She doesn't need to hear this.
translation.es: Su trabajo ha acabado. Ya puede irse.

translation.en: Oh, don't worry about Jimmy. He's, um... He's more here for decoration.
translation.es: No se preocupe por Jimmy. Solo es decorativo.

translation.en: Hey, you want a cappuccino or something? He makes a really mean froth.
translation.es: ¿Quiere un capuchino? Los hace con mucha espuma.

translation.en: I use nonfat milk.
Thanks, but I'm lactose intolerant.
translation.es: Gracias, pero soy alérgico a la lactosa.

translation.en: What?
Um, Jimmy, could you show our friend down to her car?
Thanks.
Cute guy. You think?
I had my 30th birthday last month.
I'm worth about $900 million.
I'm in Newsweek and Forbes in the same fucking month.
translation.es: El mismo mes salí en Newsweek y Forbes.

translation.en: I'm the all-powerful ruler of time and space, Mr. Carter.
translation.es: Soy el poderoso rey del tiempo y del espacio.

translation.en: And your friend Cyrus...
the porn guy...
he's coming to me with threats of going public.
translation.es: amenaza con sacar a la luz mis asuntos.

translation.en: Messing up my image.
Okay, awkward moment.
Look, I've never really done this before, but, um...
translation.es: Mire, yo nunca he hecho algo parecido…

translation.en: I figure you probably have...
translation.es: pero supongo que usted sí, así que…

translation.en: so here goes.
I understand there was quite a fuss the other night over at the George.
translation.es: Creo que la otra noche hubo follón en el George.

translation.en: MAN: Where's the disc, man?
JEREMY: Everybody was shitting bricks, especially Cyrus.
translation.es: Todos se cagaron de miedo, sobre todo Cyrus.

translation.en: Your brother Richard's name was mentioned.
translation.es: Y mencionaron a su hermano Richie.

translation.en: Cyrus goes out with some very bad guys...
translation.es: Cyrus salió con unos tipos muy malos…

translation.en: and when he comes back...
your brother's gone.
You see what I'm saying, Mr. Carter?
I think we both want the same thing.
translation.es: Creo que ambos queremos lo mismo.

translation.en: Who do you think you're fucking with?
Come on, come on.
Yeah? LES: Where are you?
What do you want? What do I want? What do I fucking want?
Talk.
I said, talk. Jack.
LES: Tell him. Tell him.
Con tells me you're doing my woman behind my back.
translation.es: Con dice que te tiras a mi mujer.

translation.en: Now tell me Con's lying. Tell me that, Jack.
He is lying. Is your name Jack?
I love this woman. I'm thinking about killing her.
You don't wanna know what I'm thinking about doing to you.
translation.es: No me gustas, Carter. Y algo te haré.

translation.en: You're a real tough guy on the phone.
Audrey, you gotta get out of there. Go. He won't touch you.
translation.es: Audrey, vete. Vamos, no te tocará.

translation.en: LES: Oh, I won't touch her, huh? I won't touch her?
Jack, please, listen-- If you don't fucking shut up...
I'm telling you, Carter, I'm two seconds away from fucking pasting this broad.
translation.es: Estoy a dos segundos de partirle la cara a esta golfa.

translation.en: Get your ass back in town tonight,
translation.es: Pásate por la ciudad o los dos estaréis…

translation.en: or you're both gonna be-- You lay a hand on her,
translation.es: Pásate por la ciudad o los dos estaréis… Les, si la tocas, volveré y te enterraré vivo.

translation.en: and I swear to Christ I will come there and bury you alive.
translation.es: Les, si la tocas, volveré y te enterraré vivo.

translation.en: When I finish with you, you're gonna wish I killed you.
translation.es: Cuando acabe contigo, desearás que te mate.

translation.en: Audrey, what do you wanna do? I'm here for you.
LES: Jack, are you fucking pathetic?
Go ahead, tell him, Audrey. What do you wanna do?
Audrey, what do you wanna--? What do you wanna do?
LES: You listening, lover boy? Yeah.
You getting it?
Les, listen to me. I'm out of Vegas, understand? It ends here.
translation.es: Les, lo de Las Vegas se acabó. Termina aquí.

translation.en: Fuck you. It ends when I say it ends, you cocksucker.
translation.es: Que te jodan. Acabará cuando yo diga.

translation.en: EDDIE: Come on, baby, get in there.
Yeah, get that fine booty in there. What's up?
translation.es: Ven, pequeña, sube. Dentro hay cosas. ¿Qué tal?

translation.en: You got some-- Check out her tongue.
EDDIE: Showtime.
We're taking you to a party.
Come on, it'll be fun.
EDDIE: Yeah, baby, that's it.
DOREEN: No.
DOREEN: I need to leave. I need to leave.
It's okay. It's cool.
DOREEN: No.
Jack, what do you say, Jack?
You pick me a winner today, huh?
Did you come up with a sure thing?
It's a bad time, Con.
Boy, you're telling me. You remember Peter, don't you?
translation.es: ¡No me digas! Me recuerdas a Peter.

translation.en: CON: Jack! Jack! No.
No, Jack.
Say, Jack, when I said,
translation.es: Verás, Jack… Cuando dije que te ocuparas del negocio o él se ocuparía de ti…

translation.en: "You take care of the business or the business will take care of you,"
translation.es: Cuando dije que te ocuparas del negocio o él se ocuparía de ti…

translation.en: did we have a bad connection on the cell?
Maybe you weren't listening?
Fuck it. It don't matter, does it?
Hey, sport, I was real sorry to hear about you and Audrey.
translation.es: Siento mucho lo tuyo con Aubrey.

translation.en: What are you gonna do? He's the big dog. There's no way around that.
translation.es: Pero él es el jefe, no se puede remediar.

translation.en: He gets the girl, Jack.
You get what you get.
Jack!
Doreen?
I saw that.
DOREEN: Caught.
What happened to your face?
Couple of guys jumped me on the elevator on the way up.
translation.es: Me han asaltado en el ascensor.

translation.en: Really?
No, I...
I-- I slipped, you know?
It happens sometimes when you get older, you know?
Your ticket for your Mustang, you know.
I got it downstairs.
You probably should be getting back now.
What are you gonna do?
Well, you know, I'm gonna be taking off today.
Why? Well...
It just worked out that way.
For good?
For a while.
Doreen, before I go, I just...
I just wanna tell you I think you're a special girl. I mean that.
translation.es: decirte que eres una chica especial. En serio.

translation.en: And in these 48 hours...
I could see that.
Things happen to us, Doreen, you know? We...
translation.es: Pero a veces ocurren ciertas cosas.

translation.en: We make mistakes. We...
We fall down...
and we get into trouble. It happens to everybody. It does.
translation.es: nos metemos en líos. Nos ocurre a todos, es cierto.

translation.en: But it doesn't mean, you know,
everything that happened yesterday has to happen every day. It doesn't.
translation.es: que lo ocurrido en el pasado vaya a repetirse. Eso no.

translation.en: I mean, you don't wanna do it like me and spend your whole life looking backwards.
translation.es: No quieras ser como yo y pasarte la vida mirando atrás.

translation.en: You know, it is what it is. We can't change our history.
translation.es: Es lo que es. No podemos cambiar nuestra historia.

translation.en: We can't do that, I mean...
But you can go past it.
Just right past it.
And, you know, up ahead,
it's all new, you know? It's...
It's new. It's yours if you want it.
translation.es: Es nuevo. Y es tuyo si lo quieres.

translation.en: I gotta tell you, your mother loves you.
No matter what you think, she loves you.
translation.es: Creas lo que creas, te quiere.

translation.en: Maybe you got things you have to talk to her about
translation.es: Quizá deberías comentar cosas con ella, como

translation.en: or some problems, whatever.
translation.es: Quizá deberías comentar cosas con ella, como tus problemas.

translation.en: You should talk to her. She'll listen.
I don't know what happened.
He worked with dad. He was always really nice.
translation.es: Él trabajaba con papá. Era muy simpático.

translation.en: I thought I, um...
I mean...
I thought it was gonna be cool.
Fun, you know?
We had some champagne and, uh, he asked if I...
translation.es: Tomamos champán y me preguntó si quería…

translation.en: wanted to go to this party.
You should have seen my friends' faces.
translation.es: Debiste ver la cara de mis amigas.

translation.en: I don't even remember what happened.
I just remember...
not being able to move much.
I remember, um...
wanting to leave.
Wanting it to stop.
Wanting to...
go home.
It's all my fault. No.
It's not your fault.
None of this is your fault.
You gotta believe that.
No, no, no.
None of this is your fault. None of it.
translation.es: No es culpa tuya. Nada de esto lo es.

translation.en: Yeah. GERALDINE: Jack?
Who is this? It's Geraldine.
Look, I didn't know she was Richie's daughter.
translation.es: Yo no sabía que era su hija.

translation.en: When I found out who she was, I got the disc to Richie right away.
translation.es: En cuanto me enteré, le di el disquete a Richie.

translation.en: I didn't know what he'd do with it.
translation.es: Yo no sabía qué haría con él.

translation.en: He went to them and said he was taking the disc to the cops.
translation.es: Él les dijo que se lo entregaría a la Policía.

translation.en: Cyrus knows I gave him the disc.
translation.es: Cyrus sabe que yo le di el disquete.

translation.en: He's on his way here. He's coming over now, Jack.
translation.es: Ahora viene hacia aquí. ¡Va a venir, Jack!

translation.en: I didn't know who to call. I was just...
translation.es: No sabía a quién llamar. Yo solo…

translation.en: Shit. I'm sorry.
I'm so sorry.
JACK: Where's Eddie? He's not working today.
Where's he live? What's going on?
Where's he live? Jack. Jack. Jack.
Will you listen to me? For just a minute.
I've been in it all my life, on both sides of the ocean.
translation.es: Llevo en esto toda la vida, aquí y en Inglaterra.

translation.en: And I'm telling you this. If you get mixed up
translation.es: Llevo en esto toda la vida, aquí y en Inglaterra. Si te mezclas en esto como tu hermano

translation.en: in whatever it was your brother was into
translation.es: Si te mezclas en esto como tu hermano

translation.en: you got a pretty good chance of winding up exactly the same as he did.
translation.es: tienes muchas posibilidades de acabar como él.

translation.en: And those two ladies are gonna have to go into mourning all over again.
translation.es: Y esas dos mujeres volverán a llevar luto.

translation.en: Now, I can't tell you what to do, but I can tell you this:
translation.es: No sé qué debes hacer, pero puedo decirte esto:

translation.en: Getting yourself killed won't bring Richie back.
translation.es: Aunque te maten, Richie no volverá.

translation.en: Revenge doesn't work.
Sure it does.
They knew what they were fucking getting into. JACK: Don't play me!
translation.es: -Ya sabían dónde se metían. -¡No me mientas!

translation.en: It was Cyrus' deal, man.
He probably killed your brother, all right?
translation.es: Seguramente él mató a tu hermano.

translation.en: It wasn't fucking me!
He's at a fucking party right now
at some fucking fencing club or something, with Kinnear, all right?
translation.es: en un club de mierda con Kinnear, ¿vale?

translation.en: I was just fucking playing-- I was just playing around.
Go get them. I don't--
I'm having a real hard time understanding something, Eddie.
translation.es: Hay algo que no acabo de entender.

translation.en: What could she have done to you that was so bad
that you'd wanna do this to her, hm?
translation.es: para que tú le hicieras eso?

translation.en: Because what you did doesn't go away.
She trusted you. And you raped her.
translation.es: Ella confiaba en ti y tú la violaste.

translation.en: She was my brother's daughter. My family.
translation.es: ¡Era la hija de mi hermano! ¡Mi familia!

translation.en: And it's my fault.
Because if I had been here, this never would have gone down.
translation.es: De estar yo aquí, nunca habría ocurrido.

translation.en: So now I gotta make it right. I gotta do that.
I mean, what would you do if it was your daughter?
translation.es: ¿Qué harías tú si se tratase de tu hija?

translation.en: Jack, don't kill me, man.
You killed yourself.
CON: Jack, stop!
Get him! Go, go, go!
Jack!
Jack, stop!
Goddamn it!
Motherfucker.
Oh, fuck!
CON: Don't lose him.
Stay on him.
Just get on him.
You cocksucker!
Come on, come on, come on.
Drive, drive, drive!
Where is he?
Oh, man. Jack!
There you go.
Don't turn.
Is this what you want?
Oh, shit.
Sorry, Mr. Carter. You're not on the list.
translation.es: Lo siento, señor Carter. No está en la lista.

translation.en: Nobody likes the list guy.
Can I help you with something?
I don't think so.
Look, Mr. Phone Guy, do you have any idea who I am?
I'm gonna buy your goddamn hotel so I can fire you.
I wanna talk to Mr. Fletcher. Les Fletcher.
translation.es: Quiero hablar con el señor Fletcher. Les Fletcher.

translation.en: No, you listen to me, you neophyte toady. I am in the middle of a party here.
translation.es: ¡Escúcheme, sapo neófito! Estoy en una recepción.

translation.en: I should not be having to deal with this. Now, put me through to your boss.
translation.es: No tengo que aguantar esto. ¡Póngame con su jefe!

translation.en: Listen, why don't you girls go in the back room, and I'll...
translation.es: Chicas, marchaos a la habitación de atrás.

translation.en: I'll meet you back there in a minute.
I got some things to take care of.
Did you know who she was?
Excuse me? Did you knew she was my blood?
Jack, are we gonna go through this goddamn little dance again?
translation.es: Jack, ¿otra vez con este maldito baile?

translation.en: Huh? Go ahead. Take out your gun, Jack.
translation.es: Adelante. Saca tu pistola delante de todos y dispárame

translation.en: Take out your gun in front of all these people here.
translation.es: Saca tu pistola delante de todos y dispárame

translation.en: Put one right between my eyes.
I don't think you could handle jail the rest of your life.
translation.es: Pero no creo que soportases la cárcel.

translation.en: I wanna tell you something, slick.
The man you want
is that little piss-ass Kinnear.
Him and the old guy. So stop breaking my balls, all right?
translation.es: Él y el viejo. Ahora deja de tocarme las pelotas.

translation.en: I'm a goddamn businessman just trying to stay afloat, just like you.
translation.es: Yo solo intento mantenerme a flote. Igual que tú.

translation.en: You're nothing like me.
Excuse me, wait a minute, Jack. All of a sudden you care?
translation.es: Un momento, Jack, ¿de repente te importa?

translation.en: All of a sudden, what are you, some kind of fucking good guy, hm?
translation.es: ¿Qué te pasa? ¿De repente vas de bueno?

translation.en: Hey, you're the bad brother, remember? I know who I am. Heh.
translation.es: -Eres el hermano malo, recuerda. -Sé quién soy.

translation.en: Well, Jack, listen, I would love to sit here and jaw with you
but I gotta get back to the talent, so...
Hey, uh, Jack...
let it go.
Come on, Jack, let's see what you got.
Hey, hey. Hey, Jack, come on.
Goddamn, Jack.
Your little brother put up a better fight than you did.
translation.es: Tu hermanito peleó mejor que tú.

translation.en: You should finish what you start.
Yeah. Hey, you should fix your tie a little bit there.
translation.es: Sí. Arréglate un poco la corbata.

translation.en: Have a good time.
MAN: Where is it, Richie?
JACK: You got a car?
Let's take a ride.
Where are we going, Mr. Carter?
Hey. Hey, slow down. Turn the lights back on, please.
Come on, shut the door. It's not my problem.
I didn't do it.
Will you slow down, please? You're gonna kill us.
Please!
Okay, okay. What do you want? You want a clean slate?
Just give me five minutes in front of a laptop.
translation.es: Deme cinco minutos ante un ordenador.

translation.en: Slow down! You're gonna kill us! That's the point, Jeremy.
translation.es: -¡Más despacio o nos mataremos! -De eso se trata, Jeremy.

translation.en: Okay. You want money?
Just name your price. I've got more money than God.
You need a drink.
It's okay.
It's all right, Jeremy.
Is this how you did it to Richie, huh?
This how you did it, Jeremy, huh?
You think he screamed too? You like it?
I didn't kill your brother, Mr. Carter.
translation.es: ¡Yo no maté a su hermano, señor Carter!

translation.en: JACK: Get up. JEREMY: Mr. Carter.
You're making a mistake. Get up. Move.
Listen to me, you're making a mistake here.
Cyrus told me your brother was gonna go to the police with his disc.
translation.es: Cyrus dijo que Richie iba a llevar el disquete a la Policía.

translation.en: And he said if he went down, I'd go down, okay?
translation.es: Y que si él caía, yo también caería.

translation.en: Please... I didn't know what to do, Mr. Carter.
So you had him killed. No, No, no.
I just said to him to get the disc back, that's all.
translation.es: Solo le dije que recuperase el disquete.

translation.en: I had nothing to do with it. I just told Cyrus to get the disc.
translation.es: Lo juro, no fui yo. Le dije a Cyrus que

translation.en: I told him to get the disc,
and that our business together would be over.
translation.es: y que se acabó el negocio.

translation.en: That's all. Mr. Carter, I swear to you.
translation.es: ¡Eso es todo! ¡Se lo juro, señor Carter!

translation.en: I swear to you, I didn't do anything.
I didn't kill him, Mr. Carter. Please believe me.
He said if I said anything
he would ruin me.
And then you came--
You came along and--
Please, Mr. Carter. Please, it was Cyrus.
He killed your brother and Geraldine, not me.
translation.es: ¡Él mató a su hermano y a Geraldine, no yo!

translation.en: He said he was working with some guy.
It was them. They did it. No more talk.
Turn around.
Please, no, no, no. Turn around.
Be a man for once in your life.
translation.es: Sé un hombre por una vez.

translation.en: I'm gonna do something for you...
translation.es: Voy a hacer algo por ti…

translation.en: nobody ever did for me.
translation.es: que nadie ha hecho por mí.

translation.en: I'm gonna give you a second chance.
translation.es: Voy a darte una segunda oportunidad.

translation.en: Please don't make me come back.
I won't, Mr. Carter. Thank you.
translation.es: No lo haré, señor Carter. Gracias.

translation.en: Thank you. Thank you so much.
I promise I won't make you come back.
translation.es: Prometo que no le haré volver.

translation.en: Thank you.
JACK: Hey.
Hey. What are you doing?
Sorry, Jack. I don't usually get my hands dirty,
translation.es: Lo siento, Jack. No suelo ensuciarme las manos, pero en tu habitación

translation.en: but I checked your room and there was nothing there, so...
translation.es: No suelo ensuciarme las manos, pero en tu habitación no había nada.

translation.en: Listen, about this, uh, Doreen thing.
translation.es: Oye, en cuanto al asunto de Doreen…

translation.en: She'll be all right, I think.
Kids are resilient, you know?
And, uh, this thing with Richie, I mean, Christ, that was bloody awful.
translation.es: Y en cuanto a lo de Richie, eso fue espantoso.

translation.en: I don't know what Cyrus was thinking, but, heh, a man's got to make a living.
translation.es: No sé en qué pensaría Cyrus, pero hay que ganarse la vida.

translation.en: I tried to keep you out of it, but you insisted
on this post facto big-brother thing.
translation.es: pero insististe en hacer de hermano mayor.

translation.en: So I figured if I left enough dangling,
translation.es: Así que pensé que si dejaba pistas

translation.en: you would find my disc for me.
What a mess, eh?
All over a shiny piece of plastic.
translation.es: Y todo por un pedazo de plástico.

translation.en: Listen.
I'll get rid of the disc,
you seem to have gotten rid of everything else, so...
translation.es: Ya que te has deshecho de lo demás.

translation.en: You may have hardware concealed about your person.
translation.es: Quizá lleves un arma oculta en tu cuerpo.

translation.en: But remember:
You kill me, you'll be on the run for the rest of your life.
translation.es: Si me matas, pasarás el resto de tu vida huyendo.

translation.en: It's been nice knowing you, Jack.
JACK: Brumby.
I'm not turning round.
translation.es: No voy a darme la vuelta.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
Uncle Jack.
JACK: Your mother told me I'd find you here.
translation.es: Tu madre dijo que estabas aquí.

translation.en: I thought you were gone. I am gone. I just wanted to come by
translation.es: -Creí que te habías ido. -Y me voy. Solo quería

translation.en: and say goodbye to you, face-to-face.
What, uh...? What happened to your beard thing? Oh, that?
translation.es: -¿Qué le ha pasado a tu barba? -¿Esto?

translation.en: Well, I thought it would be time for a change. I just got rid of it.
translation.es: Pensé que era hora de cambiar y me deshice de ella.

translation.en: Did you fall again?
This?
Yeah, I did, I fell down. I gotta...
get new shoes.
We're gonna be okay, you know?
Mom and me.
I know.
Thanks for being here. It would've meant a lot to Dad, you know?
translation.es: Gracias por venir. Papá estaría contento.

translation.en: He was a good man. Yeah.
Guess you gotta go, huh?
Yeah.
Do you remember when I said you're special?
You better remember that or you're gonna have a big problem with me, okay?
translation.es: Más te vale recordarlo o te las verás conmigo.

translation.en: Take care of yourself, Doreen.
You too.
I like the new look.
